detailsData.title: Proven Experience
detailsData.content: With over 40 years of legal experience, the trial attorneys at The Perecman Firm, P.L.L.C., have recovered more than half a billion dollars in verdicts and settlements for our clients.

detailsData.title: Stellar Reputation
detailsData.content: Our attorneys have won groundbreaking cases that have reshaped the law in New York to better support accident victims. Many attorneys throughout the state choose to refer their toughest catastrophic injury cases to us.

detailsData.title: Compassionate Service
detailsData.content: Our legal team is extremely prepared and knowledgeable. We approach every case as if it is going to trial, ensuring we consider arguments from all angles with a team mentality.

detailsData.title: Family Approach
detailsData.content: We treat everyone like family – both clients and our team. When you turn to our firm after being hurt in an accident, we will take the time to get to know you and understand what you’re going through.

subHeading: Relentless Advocates for the Seriously Injured
valueProp: With thousands of personal injury attorneys in New York, it may feel overwhelming to choose the right one. That’s why it’s so important to look at a firm’s experience and results handling cases like yours before you make a decision. At The Perecman Firm, P.L.L.C., our attorneys have more than 40 years of experience handling some of the toughest catastrophic injury cases in New York. We fight for people who have had their lives turned upside down by devastating construction accidents, car accidents, premises liability accidents, and accidents leading to wrongful death. Our law firm is focused on advocating for those who have suffered serious injuries in accidents due to others’ wrongdoing. Our attorneys have obtained more multi-million dollar case results in their time at The Perecman Firm than many other personal injury lawyers achieve throughout their decades-long careers. Few can match up to our results in the courtroom and at the negotiation table.
